WHO SAFE CHILDBIRTH CHECKLIST IMPLEMENTATION GUIDE  32
   Guide to Holding a Launch Event  
INSTRUCTIONS 
Use the following discussion points and activities during a Safe Childbirth Checklist Launch event to introduce 
the WHO Safe Childbirth Checklist.  
1. INTRODUCE YOURSELF AND THE TEAM GUIDING THE IMPLEMENTATION OF
THE WHO SAFE CHILDBIRTH CHECKLIST.
